message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal for us both to start.
Let's try 55/45, a bit more fair for me, don't you think?
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'll take the same split you offered, but with us reversed. It's still a better deal for you than if we let this go another round.
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. 52/48, take it before the money loses more value!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm willing to accept a smaller gain to end this now. 51/49, take it or leave it. We're both losing money otherwise.
